title: Scholar…I Don’t Want Any…Meow - Novel Updates

description:
Blasted scholar, why aren't you scared of me!

......

Wretched scholar, return my primordial spirit!

This is the story of a cat who kidnapped a scholar and was then swindled away by the scholar, very cute.>
